moTa: The Mazda MX-5 Miata is available as a convertible. The 2018 MX-5 Miata starts at $25,295 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $875. It gets EPA-estimated 29 MPG combined. The Mazda MX-5 Miata competes against models like the FIAT 124 Spider, Volkswagen Beetle, and smart ForTwo Electric Drive. The MX-5 Miata is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. May require specific trim level and/or optional features. and commuters Commuter vehicles have a minimum EPA-estimated mileage of 30 mpg combined.
